product_name: Outdoor Research Wallflower Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wear the women's Outdoor Research Wallflower Pants to the crags this summer for durable coverage and breathable, lightweight comfort. Ripstop cotton is durable enough to withstand bouldering season after season and breathes as only cotton can. Garment washed for softness; cut for easy movement. Low-profile waist fits under a harness. Zippered pocket on thigh holds a cellphone. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging. Front patch pockets; rear pockets with button-flap closures. Outdoor Research Wallflower Pants feature a standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the women's Outdoor Research Wallflower Pants to the crags this summer for durable coverage and breathable, lightweight comfort.
